name: Let Me out (Witty Woodpecker Games)
description:
This is a fun precision game where you have to shoot a ball without touching the spinning geometrical obstacles.

Shoot the ball through various geometrical designs.Beat your best store and advance to more difficult and challenging levels.

How to Play?

Tap the screen of the device at the right time to shoot the ball, ball will throw in the direction of the arrow, the objective is to throw ball outside of the spinning wheel.

Features

◉ Simple and neat & clean graphics
◉ Insanely simple and addictive
◉ Endless game-play that never gets old
◉ Free download & free play

How far can you get? Enjoy the challenge.

Happy Playing

Give us a review and tell us what you think!! We are always happy to hear y'all.

FOLLOW & LIKE US:
